description: This file implements the main React component for a Tic Tac Toe game, managing game state, rendering the game UI, and handling game logic including player moves, win/draw detection, and game reset functionality.

methods.name: calculateWinner
methods.description: Determines if there is a winner given the current state of the board.

methods.name: handleClick
methods.description: Handles user clicks on a game square, updating game state and checking for game end conditions.

methods.name: resetGame
methods.description: Resets the game state to start a new game.

methods.name: renderSquare
methods.description: Renders a single square of the game board.

methods.name: getStatusMessage
methods.description: Generates a status message based on the current game state.
